Class StockObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ElementObject
      • StockObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUIElement

    public class StockObject
extends ElementObject
    IUIElement for displaying the information of stocks to users

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockObject

        public StockObject(ATM atm,
                   ViewStockScreen owner,
                   Stock stock)
        Create a new stock object
        Parameters:
        atm - Reference to the current ATM session.
        owner - The stock screen view that will be holding this IUIElement
        stock - The stock that this will be about.

      • StockObject

        public StockObject(ATM atm,
                   ViewStockScreen owner,
                   StockPosition stockPosition)
        Initialize a stock object where the customer already owns some of the stocks
        Parameters:
        atm - A reference to the current ATM session.
        owner - The stock screen view that will be holding this element.
        stockPosition - The respective stock position the current logged in customer has.
